snippet: The G.O.P.'s problems are self-induced, from inexperienced candidates to the attack on Planned Parenthood and attempts to shut the government.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: The G.O.P.'s problems are self-induced, from inexperienced candidates to the attack on Planned Parenthood and attempts to shut the government.

headline.print_headline: Republicans Are Their Own Worst Enemy
headline.main: Republicans Are Their Own Worst Enemy
